data.title: SOUP CAN RABBIT — MONSTARK
data.meta_description: Classic Nuclear Rabbit "Soup Can Rabbit" shirt design reprinted from the original artwork by the original artist, Mark Thompson (Monstark). Color print on high-quality t-shirt available at MONSTARK.COM!
data.text:
Soup’s good food, won’t you agree?

After being out of print for years, this classic Nuclear Rabbit design has returned and it’s only available here at monstark.com.

This new printing of the original shirt design has been reproduced and printed by the original artist, Mark Thompson (Monstark). The image has been scanned from the original artwork and is printed on super-soft, high-quality 100% cotton fabric. It’s one of the most comfortable shirts around, even if your torso resembles a soup can.

Details:

• Full-color DTG print on unisex t-shirt

• Super comfortable Bella + Canvas 100% cotton shirt

• Fabric weight: 4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²)

• Pre-shrunk fabric

Care instructions:

Your shirt is printed with high-quality inks that won't fade for a long time if properly cared for. To help avoid fading, cracking, or shrinking, you should machine wash cold, turned inside-out, on a gentle cycle using mild detergent. Use non-chlorine bleach only when necessary, and do not use fabric softeners or dry-clean the shirt. Tumble dry on low, or hang dry for longest print life. If you need to iron garment, turn it inside-out and use a cool iron, avoiding ironing the print.
